analysis.description:
DSExec.tryExec (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#10-16) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- target.call.value(value)(calldata) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#14-16)
KkkTokenSale.isContract (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#541-548) is declared view but contains assembly code
c in DSExec.tryExec (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#46-49) is a local variable never initialiazed
c in DSExec.exec (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#34-35) is a local variable never initialiazed

KkkTokenSale.KkkTokenSale (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#513-537) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-key.transfer(destFoundation,FUTURE_DISTRIBUTE_LIMIT) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#531-532)
	-key.transfer(destFoundation,soldByChannels) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#532-535)

KkkTokenSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#550-603) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-key.transfer(msg.sender,requested) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#589-592)

KkkTokenSale.finalize (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#606-616) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-key.transfer(destFoundation,key.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#609-612)

KkkTokenSale.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(dst,wad) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#22-24:

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/41/0xd040c29b8af036a502ef012cc49e37a160f251ec.sol#410:
